properties.Name: CustomerConsent
properties.Description: Consent provided by the customer during the specified period.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: ConsentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Consent.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: ProofOfConsentDocumentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Document.

Columns.Name: CustomerConsentNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the customer consent.
